Posts.Title: good news and not so good news lia77 lia77

Posts.Content: lia77 wrote: Hey, ladies!!! I been on after surgery appointment today and I have the news: my node is negative but margin is not clear. I have to go back to clear margin on 13 of June. Please wish me luck. The surgeon told me today this full operation, because second lump located very deep. He also told me this is a liquid in my breast. He wanted drain it out today, but decided to wait 2 weeks (plan to do it together with surgery) Lialia Log in to post a reply
